description:
ALLN describes itself as a 'decentralized application platform for real consumption created by Huafu Enterprise Holdings Limited'. It aims to interconnect with the flight service of Far Eastern Air Transport (FAT), with a view towards densifying and broadening its navigation network in various regions. ALLN aspires to function as a transaction channel for smart contracts, consumption, and asset allocation.

name: Airline & Life Networking Token
